Are the strings of a classical lyre made of gut?	Yes
Are the strings of a classical lyre made of gut?	Yes
Does a classical lyre have a sound-chest?	Yes
Is lyre played in mordern Greece?	No
Which part of the strings does the left hand touch?	The lower strings
In which place is lyre still played?	North-eastern parts of Africa
Does a classical lyre have a fingerboard?	Yes
Is a guitar played with a plectrum like a lyre?	Yes
